Structs/DomainID.html#/s:16libappudo_mas.name: rawValue
Structs/DomainID.html#/s:16libappudo_mas.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique group id.

Structs/DNS/ZoneFlags.html#/s:16libappud.name: NOTRANSFER
Structs/DNS/ZoneFlags.html#/s:16libappud.abstract: Do not allow transfer to slave servers.

Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html#/s:16lib.name: EDIT
Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html#/s:16lib.abstract: The edit path is exposed to the HTTP server.

Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html#/s:16lib.name: MASTER
Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html#/s:16lib.abstract: The backend user should is also added to the master group.

Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html#/s:16lib.name: DISK
Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html#/s:16lib.abstract: The account get’s a disk with limited size

Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html.name: CreatFlags
Structs/Account/CreatFlags.html.abstract: CreatFlags contains the mode used to create a new account.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: SSLAddFlag
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: SSLAddFlag contains the mode used to add an ssl cert.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: get(_:)
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Get an existing account by its unique name.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: remove(_:)
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Remove an existing account by its unique name.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: current
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Returns the current account id executing the run.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: active
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Returns true if the account is active.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: reset()
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Reset the account. This will delete all data, users and runs.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: addSSLCert(_:cert:key:flags:)
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Add an SSL certificate to use with one or more domains.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: linkSSLCert(_:cert:)
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Link SSL certificate with an existing domain.

Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.name: removeSSLCert(_:unused:)
Structs/Account.html#/s:16libappudo_mast.abstract: Remove SSL certificate from all domains and accounts.

Structs/Account.html.name: Account
Structs/Account.html.abstract: Single accounts are added, updated and removed with an Account. Appudo is a multi account system where each account has multiple users. An Account can have multiple domains to access its runs. To use this API the user of the current login must be in the master group.

Structs.html#/s:16libappudo_master15Acco.name: AccountListItem
Structs.html#/s:16libappudo_master15Acco.abstract: AccountListItem represents a single item in a AccountList.

Structs/DomainID.html.name: DomainID
Structs/DomainID.html.abstract: DomainID holds a domain’s unique id. Other APIs can accept DomainIDs.

Structs.html#/s:16libappudo_master20Serv.name: ServerDomainListItem
Structs.html#/s:16libappudo_master20Serv.abstract: ServerDomainListItem represents a single item in a ServerDomainList.

Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.name: AlphasortASC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for Account listings with ascending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.name: AlphasortDSC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for account listings with descending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.name: AlphasortASC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for Account listings with ascending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.name: AlphasortDSC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:16libappudo_master12Al.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for account listings with descending alphabetical order.

Extensions/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV.name: set(_:_:auth:token1:token2:token3:)
Extensions/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV.abstract: Set the mail addr for a user.

Extensions/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV.name: unset(_:)
Extensions/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV.abstract: Unset the mail addr for a user.

Extensions/CertID.html#/s:9libappudo6Cer.name: value
Extensions/CertID.html#/s:9libappudo6Cer.abstract: Returns the cert for the unique user id.

Extensions/AccountID.html#/s:9libappudo9.name: value
Extensions/AccountID.html#/s:9libappudo9.abstract: Returns the account for the unique account id.

Classes/AccountList.html.name: AccountList
Classes/AccountList.html.abstract: AccountList is a chunked list representation for Account listings.

Classes/ServerDomainList.html.name: ServerDomainList
Classes/ServerDomainList.html.abstract: ServerDomainList is a chunked list representation for Account listings.
